data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 12.1 & iPad Air 2 - iOS 12.1.1 (PB 3)
data.actual_result: There is nearly no padding at the bottom of it, at the right side long user names/actions also get cut off.
data.expected_result: There should be some padding at the bottom of the current user/action info and on the right side of it when the name/action is too long.
data.short_description: Audit Log: Missing padding at the bottom (and the right side) for current user/action info
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the server name - Go to your Server Settings - Open Audit Log - Scroll a bit down - Observe the top with the current user/action info
